query: Who is the headlining the main event card of UFC 315?

results.title: UFC 315: Muhammad vs Della Maddalena
results.snippet: Main Card ; C · Welterweight Title Bout. #5 · Belal Muhammad · Jack Della Maddalena ; C · Women's Flyweight Title Bout. #2 · Valentina Shevchenko · Manon Fiorot ; #8.

results.title: UFC 315 PPV Card Set With Welterweight Title Fight Main ...
results.snippet: Two title fights set atop UFC 315. In the main event, Belal Muhammad puts his UFC welterweight title on the line against Jack Della Maddalena.
